entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:26 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
